Sentencas: The aim of this paper is to advance in the field of the development of low-cost synthesis techniques easy to transfer at an industrial scale for electrolyte functional materials in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: New chemical route based on sol-gel process for the synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26

Sentencas: We developed an original sol-gel route to synthesize La9.33Si6O26 oxides.
Titulo: New chemical route based on sol-gel process for the synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26

Sentencas: This approach is straightforward, inexpensive, versatile and it produces Pure powders with controlled size and morphology.
Titulo: New chemical route based on sol-gel process for the synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26

Sentencas: All these parameters affect the homogeneity of the gel and thus, the purity of the oxides obtained after heat treatment in air.
